divs: sighting detailsi was on the way into renselaer. it was night time and i saw these 12 lights in a row then i saw a green light in the middle! it was in the middle of a cornfield! im not sure if it was a ufo or not but i believe in ufo's and i talked to my friend and when she and her father dropped me off one night she saw the same thing but not the green lights! that night when i saw that ufo or w\e it was i kept staring at it and the light would fade in and out but it wouldn't dissapear! i never took my eyes off of it! i asked my dad what it was but he said he didnt know! i lost sight of the object when i got into town where all the stores and houses were! on my way back home i didnt see it. im not sure where i was b\c i didnt pay attention i never took my eyes off of the ufo!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Rensselaer
There were no other sightings in Rensselaer on or around March 5th 2006
Summary: it had 12 lights in a row and a green light in the middle
